message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500.  I'm confident you'll recognize its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and the market price.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,500 is significantly below my bottom line.  To make this work, I can offer it to you for $12,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I understand you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
